---
name: Pull request
about: Describe the change and why it was made

# Checklist
- [ ] I have read the project contribution guidelines (if present).
- [ ] Change is small and focused, or the PR description explains why it is large.
- [ ] Tests added/updated where applicable (unit/integration/golden tests).
- [ ] I updated `README.md` with user-facing changes (new features, CLI flags, config options, behavior or output format changes).
- [ ] I updated release notes / changelog if this is a user-visible change.
- [ ] CI is passing on my branch.

## Description
Provide a short description of the change, motivation, and any important implementation notes.

## Release notes (optional)
Add a short user-facing note suitable for a changelog or release notes.
